Thunder Bow

two handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 77
weap id [weapon]: 243 (Lightning)
range [range]: 40
precision [prec]: +3
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
ammunition [ammo]: 10
(can-be-used-underwater [uwok])
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on hit: Small Area Shock

weap id [weapon]: 704 (Small Area Shock)
damage [dmg]: 1 Capped Damage
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
area of effect [aoe]: 1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10A to forge (A2)

When the string of the Thunder Bow is drawn, a lightning bolt will appear where the arrow should have been, ready to be fired at the archer's enemies. The further the string is drawn, the more powerful the lightning bolt will be. The Thunder Bow can be a very formidable weapon in the hands of a man with strong arms and a good eye.
